attributes.action: Wake up and realise that the whole of the UK does not have a transport system like Londons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am sick of being told to use public transport and to leave my car at home......When will the Government realise that we dont all have that option..Neither my Wife or myself can get to work on public transport, and I'm sure there are many more like us.

WE DON'T ALL HAVE A TRANSPORT SYSTEM LIKE LONDONS,AND BELIEVE IT OR NOT THE UK POPULATION DOESN'T ALL LIVE IN LONDON !!!!!
